physical_appearance:The image shows the a series of weekly newsletters. All of them are rectangular in shape. The background of the newsletters are a mixture of grey and red.The masthead
 headlines
 and articles are all written in Chinese characters. There are several handwritten lines of Chinese characters on the front cover of the newsletter as well. sgcool_label_text:Chenxianbao (???) was the Chinese-language party newsletter of the Barisan Sosialis (Socialist Front)
 a left-wing political party established in Singapore in 1961. It was published weekly and sold at 10 cents a copy. Chenxianbao (???) was the Chinese-language party newsletter of the Barisan Sosialis (Socialist Front)
 a left-wing political party established in Singapore in 1961. It was published weekly and sold at 10 cents a copy.

Chenxianbao (???) was the Chinese-language party newsletter of the Barisan Sosialis (Socialist Front), a left-wing political party established in Singapore in 1961.
